Andy Coulson was employed by David Cameron to improve the Conservative Party's media operation in the run-up to the May 2010 election. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so, David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' the Capital Region. The Gillibrands purchased it to be closer to family. The home has been on the market since June 24, 2010, when it was originally listed at$ 384,000. The Senator just wanted to be closer to her family, said Kirsten Gillibrand spokeswoman Bethany Lesser. Kirsten Gillibrand 's parents, siblings, nieces and nephews live in the Capital Region.
